/wiki/Star_Pravah: Star Pravah is an Indian pay television channel that was launched in 2008 by Star TV and Fox International Channels . Its programming consists of Marathi-language television series and shows . On 1 May 2016 , the High-definition feed of the channel named Star Pravah HD was launched .
/wiki/Zee_Marathi: Zee Marathi is an Indian television channel which carries programming in Marathi , an Indian language spoken predominantly by the Marathi people of Maharashtra , west India . The channel was launched in 1999 , and was known as Alpha Marathi until 2004 when it was renamed Zee Marathi . Zee Marathi is the no . 1 regional Marathi channel in all genre ( MGEC ) . It lives quite stable on its 1st position for Maharashtrian Audience as has been the undisputed leader in the genre for over 6 continuous years . The most popular of the channel are the daily soaps - Majhya Navryachi Bayko , Agabai Sasubai and the reality show Chala Hawa Yeu Dya ( Trans . Comical - Let in some air ) which is also watched by Hindi audience as various Hindi celebrities are known to frequent it to promote their upcoming movies . An HD version of the channel , Zee Marathi HD , was launched on 20 November 2016 .
/wiki/Zee_Talkies: Zee Talkies is a Marathi television channel broadcasting Marathi movies by Zee Entertainment Enterprises . It is the only Marathi movie channel broadcasting old classics and latest Marathi movies 24 hours a day . Zee Talkies was launched on 25 August 2007 . Now this channel is available in HD on many DTH platforms .
/wiki/Mi_Marathi: Mi Marathi was an entertainment television channel owned by Shri Adhikari Brothers in Marathi language . Mi Marathi programming primarily consists of family dramas , cooking shows , news , and movies .
/wiki/ETV_Marathi: Colors Marathi previously known as ETV Marathi ( Marathi : कलर्स मराठी ) is an Indian television channel that primarily broadcasts Marathi entertainment based in Mumbai . It was owned by Viacom 18 . The channel was re-branded under the Viacom 18 Colors franchise on 22 March 2015 . [ failed verification ] Colors Marathi programming has included popular reality shows Sur Nava Dhyas Nava , Comedy chi Bullet Train , Big Boss and Dholkicha Talavar . It also hosts other shows like He Mann Bawre , Balumama , and Radha Prem Rangi Rangali .
/wiki/DD_Sahyadri: DD Sahyadri ( Marathi : दूरदर्शन सह्याद्री ) is a Marathi-language state-owned Indian Channel produced by the television station Doordarshan Kendra Mumbai .
/wiki/Mahabharat_(2013_TV_series): Mahabharat is an Indian mythological series based on the ancient Indian Sanskrit epic Mahabharat . It aired from 16 September 2013 to 16 August 2014 on Star Plus . The television show was produced by Swastik Productions Pvt . Ltd starring Saurabh Raj Jain as Shri Krishna , Shaheer Sheikh as Arjun , Pooja Sharma as Draupadi , Aham Sharma as Karna , Arav Chowdhary as Bhishma , Arpit Ranka as Duryodhan .
/wiki/Star_Plus: StarPlus is an Indian pay television channel owned by Star India . The network 's programming consists of family dramas , comedies , youth-oriented reality shows , shows on crime and television films . It is also distributed internationally by The Walt Disney Company India , subsidiary of The Walt Disney Company .
/wiki/Sony_Entertainment_Television: Sony Entertainment Television ( abbr . SET ) is an Indian Hindi-language pay television channel that was launched in October 1996 , and is owned by Sony Pictures Networks India , a subsidiary of the Japanese Sony . SET has been one of India 's most popular television channels , having produced many iconic shows such as CID , Aahat , Indian Idol , Boogie Woogie , Crime Patrol and Beyhadh .
/wiki/Sony_Entertainment_Television_(Ind: Sony Entertainment Television ( abbr . SET ) is an Indian Hindi-language pay television channel that was launched in October 1996 , and is owned by Sony Pictures Networks India , a subsidiary of the Japanese Sony . SET has been one of India 's most popular television channels , having produced many iconic shows such as CID , Aahat , Indian Idol , Boogie Woogie , Crime Patrol and Beyhadh .
/wiki/Sony_Marathi_(TV_Channel): Sony Marathi is an Indian pay television channel that broadcasts programming in Marathi . It was launched on 19 August 2018 , owned and operated by Sony Pictures Networks India .
